import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Card, CardBody, CardFooter, CardHeader, Col, Row, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, TabContent, TabPane, Table, Input, Form, FormGroup, Button } from 'reactstrap'; import InputMask from 'react-input-mask'; import classnames from 'classnames'; import List from './List'; import Form1 from './Form1'; import Form2 from './Form2'; class Forms extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { form: 'form1', form1data: { dept_no: '', instructor_sector_no: '', counting_sector_no: '', resident_list_no: '', permanent_resident_household_count: '', total_resident_person_count: '', permanent_resident_person_count: '', temporary_nonresident_person_count: '', temporary_resident_person_count: '', longterm_nonresident_person_count: '', visitor_person_count: '', enigrssrs_eni_code: '', nsc_eni_code: '', region: '', district: '', town: '', city_district: '', township: '', microdistrict: '', settlment: '', village: '', street: '', house: '', flat: '', name: '', organization: '', persons: [], }, form2data: [], form3data: [], form4data: [], form5data: [], value: '', activeTab: 'form1', f13deptno: '', f13insno: '', f13cosno: '', listnumber: '', brcnumber: '', }; this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.tabtoggle = this.tabtoggle.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { document.getElementById('f_dept_no').focus(); document.getElementById('f_dept_no').select(); } onKeyPressed(e) { if (e.keyCode === 13 || e.keyCode === 39 || e.keyCode === 40) { const form = e.target.form; const index = Array.prototype.indexOf.call(form, e.target); if (index <= form.elements.length - 1) { form.elements[index + 1].focus(); form.elements[index + 1].select(); } e.preventDefault(); } if (e.keyCode === 37 || e.keyCode === 38) { const form = e.target.form; const index = Array.prototype.indexOf.call(form, e.target); if (index > 0) { form.elements[index - 1].focus(); form.elements[index - 1].select(); } e.preventDefault(); } if (e.keyCode === 107) { console.log(e.keyCode); e.preventDefault(); } } handleChange(event) { const name = event.target.name; this.setState({ [name]: event.target.value }); console.log(event.target.value, name) } handleSubmit() { console.log(this.state.activeTab) this.submitForm1() } tabtoggle(tab) { console.log(this.state.activeTab) if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab }); } } async submitForm1(event) { console.log(this.state.form1data) // event.preventDefault(); await fetch(`http://192.168.2.103:8000/form_1`, { headers: { 'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(this.state.form1data) }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) }) .catch(error => console.error(error)) this.cleardataForm1() this.tabtoggle('3') } loading = () =>
